/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a pedestrian's perspective on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The road is filled with cars and trucks, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the road, contributing to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and vehicles.
